inn1.comm: gets swing into the left-hander,the batsman tickles it to fine leg for a single
loud appeal for a catch! The crowd goes with the Indian fielders. This one swings into Hales, who gets into tangle playing a pull,  and this hits the top of the thigh pad before lobbing to Dhoni
big inswing again, Hales wants to flick it but gets hit on the pads again
another inswinger going down the leg side this time, flicks the thigh pad and rolls to the left of the keeper
inswinger to the left-hander! Cook stays back and punches it to mid-on
this one comes in to the left-handed Cook again but it's on the leg stump, Cook nudges it through square leg for a single
angles it across the left-hander and Cook leaves it alone easily
pitches it on back of length just outside off, Cook stays back and pushes it towards cover
pushes it further up, 135 kph, and draws the batsman forward into a tentative poke.. it flies past the outside edge
shortish delivery on the body, doesn't get up as much as Cook would have liked it to but he manages to slap it down to fine leg
bowls length outside off, Hales comes forward before leaving this alone
bowls in a good channel outside off, Hales punches it to mid-off but he was a bit tentative to push forward
keeps bowling the inswingers. This one is well outside off though and the batsman defends it to cover off the back foot
keeps shaping it in around off stump, Cook comes forward more confidently and punches it back at the bowler
he is sticking to the inswingers. 9th one. The batsman comes forward and defends down the pitch
he walks across the stumps, exposing at least two stumps, but this was dangerous.. The ball was swinging towards the stumps, but he manages to flick it to deep square leg

Oh! Leading edge just evades Bhuvneshwar in his follow through! The batsman was looking to work it away to the leg side, but this swings away and surprises the batsman, catches the leading edge and lobs up towards the non-striker. The bowler leapt for it but couldnt quite make it.. very lucky there.
length delivery outside off, Cook defends to over
he stays rooted to the crease and gets an inside edge on to the pads as this one jags back in from the surface
chance for a run-out at non-striker;s as Hales takes off for a quick one to wide mid-on! But he makes it in time and the fielder missed the direct hit anyway
he stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery to mid-off

edged and past the second slip fielder! We have seen it quite often in the past 12 months. Cook stays on the backfoot and gets squared up by one that jags away, luckily for him it's just wide of the second slip
he dabs the back of the length delivery towards cover and calls for a quicks single
he stays back in the crease and squeezes out the length delivery to point
not much swing as the bowler targets the stumps, Hales punches it to midwicket
gets some slight away movement but Hales chops it away to third-man for a single
just back of length outside off, allows the batsman to chop it to point
big outswinger from a fuller length! Cook pushes forward tentatively and gets a thick outside edge to third man
bowls it full and a touch wide outside off, Hales stretches forward and punches it to cover with the swing
what has this done? It looked like it was coming in before it went away off the pitch.. Hales manages to punch it firmly to mid-off
he hops on the crease and punches the length ball to mid-off
hammered over midwicket! He plays the pull so well. Gets it off the middle as Mohit pitches it short, and whacks it away to get some warmth from inside
he sees the other side of the coin now as this one beats him outside off. The bowler pitched it further up and Cook poked at it from the crease
good work by Kohli at mid-off! He dives to his left to cut off a certain boundary. Cook had punched it on the up and had a lot of timing on it

superb shot through extra cover! He opens the stance just a little bit and transfers his body weight forward. There was nothing wrong with the ball, but he manages to punch it beautifully in the gap at wide mid-on
And he repeats the shot! Beautifully placed. It's not a drive.. more of a punch. And he creates just enough room my moving his left leg out of the way.
changes the strike over with a steer to third man
he is opening up now! Cuts this one hard through gully as the ball shapes away. Shami, running from third-man, boots it in
he comes solidly behind the line of the ball, pushes it back to the bowler
edged! But where is second slip? He has been taken away. The gully fielder and the first slip look at each other as this slides off the bat
back of length and coming in to the batsman, Cook wants a single to square leg but Hales rightly sends him back
another one swinging into the pads, the batsman nudges it straight to backward square leg
zips this one in at 132 kph but it's too leg-sidish. The batsman gets hit on the thigh pad as he looks to clip it
fuller delivery targetting the middle stump but it meets the middle of the bat on a downward swing.. punched beautifully down the ground for another boundary.
adjusts the line to outside off and immediately beats the batsman as Hales tries to push it to cover. It straightened just a bit
back of length around off stump at 137kph, punched to mid-on from the crease
he is standing tall and punching well! Gets behind the line of this shortish delivery and punches it to mid-on with a super-straight bat
goes for the yorker, but this is a half-volley. Hales has got his feet out of the way and he flicks it through midwicket for a few runs. That is kept in by the fielder running in from deep square leg
gets it to shape in, though not as alarmingly as earlier, Hales pushes it to midwicket off the back foot
stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to cover
superbly hit down the ground and was it not for Bhuvi's left foot, that was heading to the boundary. Bhuvi manages to deflect it to mid on
he stays on the back foot and chops the length delivery to Jadeja at point
edged as the batsman goes for a loose push at an away going delivery.. This flies through gully, but that man is at second slip now.. Samson at third man picks it up
some width this time and Hales cracks it to deep backward point for a couple
looks to punch it on the up but gets an inside edge on to his pads
whoaa!! That is as emphatic a pull you will see all day. It was short and Cook swivels to whack it over deep backward square leg .. that lobs over the boundary
poor line, it's on the pads and it's flicked to fine leg easily
he stands up tall and punches the back of the length delivery to cover
length delivery on the middle and leg stump, Hales punches it to midwicket. He likes room on off but gets cramped sometimes when his pads are targetted
looks to create room with his trigger movement and punches the back of length delivery to short cover
length delivery outside off, there is no room there and Cook defends it to off
nicely punched on the up, but he hits it straight back to the bowler
he stays back and cuts the length delivery to Samson at third man
he stays in the crease, punches the length delivery to the right of Jadeja at point and calls for a quick single.. That brings up the 50 of the stand
comes forward with intent and punches it on the up through cover for a couple of runs. Not much timing there, just places it well
brings the bat down in a straight line and punches this fuller delivery firmly back to the bowler
fatter and quicker on off, the batsman punches it to cover
goes deep in the crease and punches this one down to long on
he works this off his pads to deep backward square leg for another easy single
he goes through his favourite extra cover area! Came down the pitch early and chipped it inside out over the infield

Oh that has turned in big time to beat the inside edge! Hales was going for the big booming drive through extra cover but it turned in and went through the gap between bat and pad. The extra bounce meant Dhoni took it over the stumps. He flicked the bails and asked the question but the batsman seems ok. Never really drew his back foot out
waits an extra moment on the back foot and punches this flatter delivery to deep extra cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman chop it to point
looks to hit this fuller delivery too hard but mistimes it back to the bowler
he stays back and chops it past the gully - more of a third slip actually - to third man for a single
he stays back and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
fuller and just outside off, Cook comes forward confidently and punches it to mid-on with a straight bat
poor line.. on the pads again and it's easily clipped to deep backward square leg for a single
tossed up delivery, the batsman closes the face early and gets a leading edge towards backward point
pushed through on the pads, the batsman manages to get some bat on it and flicks it very fine on the leg side. Short fine leg dives for it but can't get a hand
pushed through across the right-hander, the batsman looks to cut it but is beaten
waits on the back foot and pushes it to the left of cover fielder for a single
he goes down on his knee early and drags it from outside off with an aerial sweep for a single to deep backward square
on the pads again, the batsman whips it to deep square leg
bowls length on the middle stump line, the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads
short ball outside off, Hales - who is quite tall - gets on top of that and pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
stays on the back foot and whips away the length delivery from outside off to mid-on
length delivery outside off, Cook comes forward punches it to mid-on
he waits on the back foot and opens the bat face late to run this down to third man
stays on the back foot and works it away to deep midwicket for a single
round the wicket, on off stump, he props forward
touch shorter this time, he rocks onto the back foot and drives to cover
on leg stump, flicked away to deep square leg
a fraction short again, outside off, he cuts out to the cover sweeper
a quicker delivery, Hales is nearly caught in an awkward position on the back foot but defends safely enough in the end
this time he almost gets a leading edge as he aims to work this to the leg side
still not much timing for Cook as he forces this off a thick inside edge through the leg side
back of a length outside off, driven square to backward point
gets onto the front foot and punches firmly to cover
he advances down the pitch and tries to heave a length ball over midwicket, doesn't connect and nearly loses off stump...a hint of frustration growing for Hales
tight stuff from Shami, full on middle off, no chance for Hales to free his arms and he pushes to mid-on
an appeal for lbw that was null and void due to an inside edge into Hales' pad, but that was an excellent over
floated up full and slow, Cook pushes gently down the ground
steps away to leg and cuts a length delivery almost off the stumps to short third man
dragged down short, sits up nicely on a slow pitch, and Cook pulls over midwicket
fuller this time, he opens the face and steers the ball to the cover sweeper
round the wicket, driven back towards the bowler who fields with a dive
well, it's Raina who's broken through! Hales falling to the sweep again. The ball loops up in the air off  top edge just behind him to give Dhoni a simple catch
round the wicket, full on the stumps, clipped into the leg side
stays round the wicket, wide outside off, driven down to long off
tucked wide of midwicket
leans forward and pushes down the ground
patted to the off side
comes forward and nudges this back to the bowler...a handy start for Rayudu
punched firmly back down the ground to long-on...Dhoni content to give away a few singles
punched firmly into the pitch and it bounces back to Raina
swing and a miss! Goes for a sweep to a delivery outside off, it was quite wide and goes underneath the bat
reverts to a more sedate nudge down the ground this time
goes onto the back foot and flicks this out to deep square-leg
worked out through long on to keep the strike
fired down the leg side, good take from Dhoni who would have been blinded for a second by the batsman
there's a leaping, pleading appeal from Rayudu for lbw...it's a lone scream, he thought it was pad first as Cook went to play a late cut
pushed to the off side
dragged down short, pulled to deep square-leg
floated up full and driven down to long-off

got him! Things going wrong against spin, again. Cook was coming down the pitch and couldn't reach the delivery as it slid down the leg side, actually glancing the pad on the way which is why it's not called wide. He was miles down the pitch and Dhoni had all the time in the world to whip off the bails. Well, replays show there was a thin edge to Dhoni. So that was technically a catch.
goes onto the back foot and works out to deep midwicket to get off the mark
sharp spin! An appeal for lbw but perhaps a fraction high. Root trapped deep in his crease, playing back. Dry pitch
now he nearly gets a leading edge back to the bowler as he leans forward
flicked to midwicket
a calmer push down the ground to long-on
a misfield by Raina as he moves to his right to field Bell's push-drive and ends up palming it through mid-off
flicked along the ground to midwicket...another over is hurried through, excellent period for India
round the wicket, patted to the off side
angled in towards middle and leg, played towards midwicket
good stride forward, opens his stance slightly and drives to long-off

A beauty! Appeal for a stumping. Dhoni thinks he's got him. A lovely ball from Jadeja, gripped and spun past Root's edge as he lunged forward. Replays suggest Root's foot is only on the line, not behind it. Not looking good for him. Rob Bailey, the third umpire, having a lengthy look and he's given it.
outside off, left alone
plays forward to a delivery outside off, takes a think inside edge behind square on the leg side
another edge! This ball turned as well, but Morgan did well to play it with soft hands and the ball fell well short of slip
goes back and defends to the covers
pushed back to the bowler
a very slow delivery outside off, making the batsman do all the work, Morgan places it through square cover
flicks a straight delivery to deep square and England bring up their 100
flicks a delivery from off stump down to long-on
defended to the leg side
full this time, uses his wrists and flicks down to long-on
comes forward and places this wide of cover, long-off scampers around
gets across outside off and defends
a shorter delivery, worked off the pads through square leg
opens the face and finds space in the covers
full and flicked to straight midwicket
works it straighter this time, down to long-on
comes forward, positive footwork and a clean drive to long-off
fetches this from outside off with a slog-sweep, all along the ground to deep midwicket
rocks back to a shorter delivery and cuts to deep point
a gentle delivery and gently pushed down the ground to long-on
that's nice from Bell, one of his favourite shots, a late-cut wide of slip and fine of short third man but it's an excellent chase and flick by Dhawan to save a run
full outside off, flicked to the leg side and midwicket dives over the ball
gets a good stride forward and drives past a diving Jadeja to his left
worked off the back foot, a shorter ball allowed him to use the crease, flicked through square leg
round the wicket, angled towards leg stump, a defensive push and the ball trickles behind square
defended to the on side
round the wicket, pushed to the off side
a fraction shorter, Bell drives behind square off the back foot but can't beat backward point
gets inside the line and tucks this off his hip to deep square-leg
works a straight delivery into the leg side
flicked from outside off along the ground past the outstretches right hand of Aswhin

oh, what a lovely delivery! Turn and some bounce from around off stump. Takes a thin outside edge to Dhoni. Morgan was just trying to open the face to find a gap, but credit to Ashwin there for an excellent piece of bowling
defended from middle back down the pitch
tossed up outside off, Bell drives out to deep cover
off the mark with a gentle drive down to long-on
comes forward, opens the face, places it towards backward point and although there's a hint of a scamper it's a safe enough single
pushed into the off side
a suggestion this ball held on the surface a fraction, Buttler defends
round the wicket, back of a length, pushed to cover
flicks this off around leg stump to deep square
fetches from outside off and clipped through square leg
more turn for Ashwin but Bell is able to dab this off the back foot to short third man
another appeal for lbw, Buttler trying to work a ball off the back foot to the leg side...looked too high
slightly ungainly as he whips this from off stump to deep square
pushed through on off, defended to off
comes forward and drives it back tot he bowler
eases it to long off for an easy single
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it to cover
slightly round-armish.. The batsman cuts it late past the slip fielder for a couple
gets it to drift in, Bell drives it to long-off for another single
tossed up on the stumps, Bell pushes it to long on for an easy one
he waits on the back foot and dabs it towards cover
wide enough this time but the batsman misses out, he is not able to squeeze it past cover point
tossed up and on the stumps, the batsman drives it down to long on
goes deep in the crease and chops the flatter one down to short third man
comes forward and pushes this one down the pitch, straight to the bowler
back of length, the batsman hops and nurdles it to square leg for a quick couple
keeps it tight around off stump, the batsman defends it to cover
attempts a yorker as sun peeks out from behind the clouds.. the batsman takes it on the full and flicks it to deep square leg
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
drifts down the leg side to give away an extra delivery
gets one to swing away from outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
fires in one on the blockhole and it's well dug out
he goes deep in the crease and punches it firmly, but it's straight back to  the bowler

this is good running! No, no.. this is surprising for everyone on the field as Mohit Sharma's throw from the deep has hit the non-striker's end direct. Raina wasn't even keen on taking the throw.. He thought the fielder had been slow but Mohit, from wide long off,  makes up for it with an accurate hit. Bell was well short of the crease there. No need to check with the third umpire. England slide further.
a lot depends on Buttler from here. He waits on the back foot and punches the shorter one through cover and pings the boundary
keeps waiting on the back foot and defends it to cover
stays on the back foot and punches it to cover
shuffles across and works it away to deep backward square leg to keep the strike
length delivery on off, Buttler stays back and punches it to deep extra cover for a couple
he waits on the back foot and chops it towards gully where Raina, running from second slip, is not able to stop it cleanly
he doesn't come forward at all.. stays back and defends this one to cover point
walks across the stumps to target the leg side but it flicks the thigh pad en route to backward square leg
wobbles it a bit as he delivers this one a length, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he dabs it to mid-on with soft hands and calls for a quick one
full and flighted on off, the batsman digs it out to the off side
squares him up completely! the batsman was looking to work it on the on side but gets hit on the thigh pad as this spins past his outside edge
comes forward and pushes it through cover

whoa what a catch! Raina you beauty! They couldn't catch a thing during the Test series but Raina is showing the team how to bat.. and now how to take a sharp slip catch.. The batsman gets a faint edge as he waits on the back foot and Raina at slip dives to his right to swoop it low with one hand.. Superb catch
tossed up on off, the batsman gets off the mark with a push to long on
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends
pushed through on off, the batsman defends
quicker on the stumps, he dabs it to square leg for a single
straight and full, the batsman defends it down the pitch
drifts it on the pads, the batsman nudges it to short fine for a single
flatter and a touch shorter, the batsman punches it to long off
slower and loopy, the batsman defends it down the pitch
tossed up outside off, the batsman drives it through cover
he comes forward and defends this solidly down the pitch
he waits on the back foot and steers this one to third man with the angle
comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to the leg side
full, almost a yorker, the batsman squeezes it out to point
comes forward and punches it down to long on for a single
another outside edge but this drops short of the slip fielder
on the pads this time and it's pushed to deep midwicket
that was close! Woakes gets a leading edge that was not too far from the second slip. He closed his bat face and the ball turned slightly too
quicker one on the stumps, he defends it down the pitch
nudges it towards square leg for an easy single
quicker one on the pads, tucked away to midwicket for a single
full and flighted on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to long on
this is down the leg side, easily clipped away to deep square leg
he comes forward and picks another single to long on
comes forward and whips it straight to midwicket
can't get this one away either, defends it to midwicket
slower and on off, the batsman defends it to the off side
worked away from leg stump to deep midwicket
tucked into square leg
full and driven down to long-off
pitches outside off, turns a little, left alone
drifts onto leg stump, clipped to short fine-leg, Woakes sets off the single but has to make a swift about-turn
quicker delivery, sliding into leg stump, nudged to the on side
brings out the reverse sweep-paddle but picks out backward point
dabbed into the off side
back in the crease, pushed down to long-on
can't beat the bowler this time as Raina skips across to field
and now he finds midwicket with a whip off the back foot
on leg stump, turned through square leg
opens the face and drives out to the cover sweeper
flicked in the air down to long-on
takes an inside edge into the pad and bobbles to the leg side
worked along the ground through midwicket and it's place wide enough of long-on for a second
another one pushed down the ground
defended carefully back down the pitch
driven out to cover
a full toss which is thumped firmly down the ground but only a single to long-on
this time he connects with the reverse sweep, it's a straight delivery and he actually sends it in front of square on the off side and there's no one in the deep
full outside leg, clipped to deep square
quicker delivery, played off the back foot and can't get it past the bowler
slower and fuller, Woakes comes forward and eases it down to long-on
length delivery outside off, Woakes flashes and misses
fuller this time, driven in the air but it lands short of mid-off...Woakes has to get his skates on to beat the throw, which would have been tight
tries to scoop this over short fine leg, moves across his stumps but doesn't make contact and the ball goes over leg stump
tries to do it again, this time the ball is fuller, he fails to make contact with this one as well
full on the stumps, drilled firmly straight to mid-off

picks out the fielder! Mohit having a good day in the field. A short ball from Shami, Woakes pulled it out of the middle of the bat but didn't picked the gap and couldn't keep it down so found Mohit just in front of deep square
driven down to long-off
over the wicket, appeal for the lbw but that was outside the line of off stump...the ball runs towards short third man. Sharp spin
opens his stance and drives down to long-off
goes for a slog sweep against a full delivery and just gets an inside edge into his boot
pushed to the off side
picked up over midwicket from outside off, goes one bounce to the man in the deep
short of a length over leg stump, Tredwell allows it to go through to Dhoni
back of a length, Tredwell goes for a pull and gets a big top edge that loops over Dhoni as he tries to run back. Third man manages to get around the boundary
shuffles outside leg and clips a full delivery to deep midwicket
crunched! Buttler larups a full delivery straight back towards Shami who gets a whack on his boot but manages to save what could have been a boundary
a rare boundary as Tredwell gives himself room to a short-of-a-length delivery outside off and he carves it away wide of the deep cover
short again and this time he pulls over the leg side, didn't quite come out of the middle but has enough to trickle into the deep midwicket boundary
fantastic stroke, Ashwin from round the wicket, it was full and Buttler reverse clubbed it through the covers and there's no one in the deep

nice comeback! Ashwin adjusts his line, onto off stump, Buttler comes down the pitch aiming to heave it over the leg side but lost his shape on the shot, turned into a bit of a wild mow, the ball spun and struck off stump
full, flicked back to the bowler and that's a little lazy as he fails to pick it up cleanly and allows Finn to get off strike
nicely bowled, held back slower, it gripped and turned past Tredwell's edge as he gave himself some room
driven uppishly down the ground
neatly played, flicked off his pads to deep square
length delivery which is swung cleanly down to long-on
full on the stumps, fiddled into the off side
length outside off but it's a dot ball as Finn drives to cover
back of a length, pulled out to deep midwicket using his long leavers
gets the yorker in this time, driven into the off side
full again, swinging past leg stump but Finn has moved to the leg side and the ball goes between him and the stumps
round the wicket, full outside and driven square through the off side to beat the sweeper...a career best for Tredwell (taking the positives, etc)
all the way! And it's a no-ball. Bonus for England. Another full delivery which Tredwell picks up very cleanly with a strong swing and clears long-on. First six of the innings
comes over the wicket, it's a full toss outside off, Tredwell walks across his stumps and paddles it to deep square
another full toss, it follows Finn who lofts it, one bounce, to long-on
productive over, another full delivery which is driven behind square on the off side and again the sweep can't get around
his fun is over with a ball remaining, a slower ball from Bhuvi which Tredwell tries to loft over the off side but he's through his shot too early and sends it straight up the air instead

all out off the last ball of the innings...Finn clipped a length delivery over midwicket and the last-wicket pair gamble on the extra run. Dhoni gathers the ball then throws it onto the stumps. This is very close. When are the bails dislodged? Finn may, actually, have just made it. No, it's ruled short. So just the one run.

inn2.comm: starts off with an outswinger, Rahane lets it go through
he comes a touch forward and defends the back of length delivery to point
this one is angled into the right-hander but Rahane spots it, defends it down the pitch
not much swing for Anderson and Rahane is able to defend that comfortably to the off side
shuffles across but this delivery grazes his thigh pad en route to fine-leg. The batsman had come inside the line of that one but couldn't put bat on it
he gets squared up on off stump as he tries to play this length delivery from the crease, but manages to get a single to third man
woo.. Short of length delivery, this fizzes past the outside edge at a good height. Dhawan has done this throughout the tour. He hangs his bat
length delivery on the middle stump, he comes forward and punches it to mid on
short and wide, asking to be hit and he crunches it powerfully through cover point. The fielder gets a hand , but this still has enough to tease Morgan. He does well to slide and keep it in
poor delivery! It's full and it's drifting down the leg side. Rahane flicks it fine and that races to the boundary
takes one hand of the handle as he fends at this short of length delivery, picks up a single to square leg

oh Shikhar Dhawan! He tries to defend this rising delivery to the leg side but gets completely squared up, getting a thick leading edge through gully down to third-man. He doesn't have much clue about where this has gone.. Does a 360 turn before taking off on a run
he has no problems when it's pitched up to him, whips it over midwicket for some runs
bowls length just outside off, the batsman gets an inside edge towards midwicket as he comes forward
length delivery outside off, easily left alone
he comes behind the line and defends it solidly to cover
marginally short and Rahane latches on to it, whacking it through square leg with a flat hit. Bell at square leg came close to it but that wasn't a chance. That was hit too well
he corrects his length to a fuller one outside off but gets punched through cover. This is more classical from Rahane. Excellent placement
this one is angled across and Dhawan plays inside the line to be beaten again
he defends this back of length delivery easily as it is on the pads
straight on the middle stump line, Dhawan finds it easier to deal with these, comes forward and defends
looks to work this length ball away to the leg side but can only fend it back down the pitch
he comes forward to push this length ball towards cover but gets an inside edge to the leg side
waits in the crease and chops the back of length delivery to backward point
superb delivery! Straighten just enough from short of length to zip past the outside edge. Rahane is left fishing for thin air
back of length on the middle stump line, the batsman dabs it to midwicket
stands tall to the rising delivery and dabs it down to third man
no swing for Anderson, which allows Dhawan to get behind the line easily and punch it to cover point
on a length and around off stump, Dhawan comes forward to defend that to cover
shorter delivery on the stumps, it comes straight off the surface and Dhawan manages to get on top of that, pulls it along the ground to deep square leg
full and on off stump, Dhawan looks to drive but doesn't get any timing, can only find the fielder at cover
poor line again, this is on the pads and it allows Dhawan to get off strike with a flick to fine leg
some extra bounce for Woakers, 140 kph, Rahane adjusts well and dabs it down to third man for a single
he just can't get it away! This is full and outside off, Dhawan punches it back to the bowler off the inside half of the bat..On a sunny day, he would have crashed that through cover
clips this off the pads to backward square leg for an easy couple
this time he gets it off the middle of the bat, plays that trademark crack to point off the back foot, but hits it straight to point..
bowls it just short of length, Rahane guides it to backward point off the back foot
pushes this too far down the leg side
slightly slower from Anderson this time, it messes with Rahane's timing as he looks to flick.. he gets rapped on the thigh pad
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to mid-off
short delivery and Rahane is one of the better pullers in the Indian team, controls it well and plays it to deep backward square leg
ohh! Almost chops it on. He was looking to punch it on the up through off, but gets a thick inside edge on to his boots
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to the leg side
whoa!! That has been crashed past the non-striker! Straight bat, high elbow and what not.. Beautifully hit.

and he crashes the next ball straight into the hands of point fielder. After getting his spirits lifted by that previous shot, he gives it away yet again. No respite for Dhawan. Morgan takes a simple catch by his standards. Woakes is elated. That wasn't his greatest ball
shuffles in the crease and defends the back of length delivery down the pitch
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery towards mid-on.. He falls over a touch to the off side as he plays that shot
solidly behind the length ball and defends it to the short cover fielder placed just for him
on the pads, it allows Kohli to get off the mark. He clips it easily to deep backward square to pick up a couple
on the pads, the batsman nudges it to short midwicket
length delivery marginally outside off, Rahane brings his bat down with a flash and times it really well, but finds the man at point
superb shot! This is just a delicate push off a fuller delivery.. It was on the middle and leg line, he just takes a tiny step forward and shows it the way back past Anderson.. beautiful shot
length delivery on off, defended easily to the off side
stays on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to cover point
length delivery on off, easily defended down the pitch
he comes forward and defends the length delivery solidly to cover
he waits in the crease and guides the back of length delivery down to third-man
length delivery on the stumps, defended to Cook at short midwicket
comes forward and defends the length delivery towards mid-on
oh another delectable straight push but Woakes manages to get a boot to deflect it to mid-on
doesn't really push too far forward but defends the length ball comfortably to point
gets some turn straightaway, but Kohli works him away to deep backward square leg
slower and loopy, Rahane comes forward and defends
he comes down the pitch and eases the flighted delivery to longon
flighted at 77 kph, the batsman leans forward and defends it to midwicket
he goes on the back foot and pushes the flatter delivery to square leg
outside edge! Tredwell went wide of the crease and drew the batsman forward but Kohli wasn't completely behind the line. There is no one at slip and this fetches him a few runs
starts off with a short and wide delivery, 129 kph, Rahane hops to get on top of that and steers it wide of third man
bowls length outside off, 136 kph, the batsman comes forward and defends
fuller delivery at 142 kph, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
he caresses it over extra cover! He never tries to belt it, just pushes it cover the infield calmly
how good is his timing! he just comes forward to the fuller length delivery and just pushes it with so much timing, albeit to mid-off
short and wide, this is crashed off the back foot to deep backward point where Anderson fields. He was being booed by the crowd in the stands behind him
slower and outside off, the batsman waits back and punches it to cover
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and tucks it to square leg
this will feel good! He comes down the pitch and for a bit it looks like he has gone down the wrong line, but he manages to use his wrists to scoop it towards the sight screen
waits on the back foot and defends the flatter delivery down the pitch
stays back to a full and flighted one and cuts it hard towards deep point for a single
much slower from Tredwell, the batsman though comes forward to defend it calmly
the pace is up to 141 kph, the batsman comes forward to push it to cover to Anderson, who is now in the infield..
he comes forward and dabs the fuller length delivery behind point for a single
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman drops it to his boots with a deadbat
he pegs that gap at extra cover but not much timing in this one.. He looked to hit this much harder and it was in the air for a bit. He gets four but Finn knew that wasn't really well controlled
that's full and what a beautiful way to loft it for six over the long off boundary! Makes it look effortless, Rahane
length delivery outside off, Rahane defends on the off side
length delivery coming in from outside off, pushed to point
touch shorter with width, runs it down to third man for one
but that delivery caused a problem, extra bounce from short of a length and it beats the top edge as Rahane aims square
angled into the pads, clipped in front of square on the leg side
a confident drive, striding forward into the delivery and finding cover
gets across his stumps and flicks a pretty straight delivery down to long leg
too leg side again, clipped comfortably down to long leg
gets inside the line of a short-of-a-length delivery and knocks it down to the busy long leg...Finn's line not quite right
full outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, defended square of the wicket
gets forward to a fuller delivery and drives to mid-on
nips back a touch off the seam, cramps Kohli for a room as he cuts so he can only find backward point
this is a fierce drive by Kohli, offered width by Stokes and he put his full force behind the shot. It reached deep cover in a split scond
beats the edge with one angling back in from outside off, Rahane was trying to run down to third man
a bit of extra bounce, Kohli rides it well by taking his bottom hand off the bat and works it past short leg
short of a length outside off, driven from the back foot to deep cover
short delivery, sits up nicely and Kohli sees it early then pulls through straight midwicket without quite timely it cleanly
fuller on off stump, a better length, pushed into the covers
a bouncer, very short and too short as it loops over Rahane's head

got 'im! That will give Finn a huge boost. A length delivery around off stump, Rahane trying to run the ball to third man again but only succeeds in edging low through to Buttler. Once again, Rahane fails to build on an elegant start
full and straight, tucked into midwicket to enable him to get off the mark
neat footwork as he comes down the pitch and pushes to long-on
round the wicket, flicked to midwicket who fields sharply
plenty of bottom hand as he whips this back to Tredwell
some spin there for Tredwell as this turns into Kohli who was on the back foot and had to be alert
brings him forward this time and the turn finds a thick inside edge to the leg side
a fraction shorter which means he can get well back and tuck it behind square on the leg side
full and straight, flicked to deep square
short delivery outside off, Rayudu sways out of the line and the sluggish pitch means he has plenty of time to do so
back on a full length, defended to the leg side
back of a length at off stump, defended into the covers
touch of width outside off, steered wide of backward point towards third man...quick running
defended into midwicket
leans well forward and works this wide of midwicket from a leg-stump line
pushed across outside off, nudged back to the bowler
props forward with bat and pad together
gets down the pitch and drives to long-off
the bottom hand comes into play again as he takes this from off stump down to long-on
and there's another one to long-off to end a gentle over of milking
round the wicket, full, flicked to long-on
tucked in front of square on the leg side
worked out to midwicket
goes for a sweep, it glances off the pad down the leg side and rebounds off Buttler
picks out square leg this time as he flicks off his pads
same fielder in action again as he can't find the gap on the leg side
compact footwork as he steps down the pitch and then drives past Tredwell's left
round the wicket again, keeping the ball along the ground out to deep midwicket which takes India to 100
full and driven firmly to mid-off who is inside the circle
plays this from quite deep in the crease, defended
good placement as he flicks this in the air over the two men at midwicket, between long-on and deep square-leg
outside off, he's forward and defends
round the wicket, on leg stump, worked to square leg
full outside leg, paddle-sweeps it through short fine-leg
milks this off his pads out to deep midwicket
slightly quicker at 55mph, flicked to midwicket
forward and defended to the leg side
sweeps this very fine, comes off a bottom edge wide of Buttler and races to the boundary
worked away to deep square leg
over the wicket now, short enough to allow him onto the back foot to work into the leg side
round the wicket to Kohli who defends towards midwicket
he breaks the mode of tip-tap cricket by coming down the pitch then whips it over midwicket with immense power from his bottom hand, lands just short of six
now he calmly tucks a single backward of square
outside off, defended to the covers
fantastic stroke, leans into a lovely cover drive which he threads through the off side
not quite so full this time, defended to the covers

goodness me! Almost out of nowhere, Kohli has picked out mid-on. A full delivery and he tries to flick it through the leg side with plenty of bottom hand and only finds Tredwell. A few words are exchanged as Kohli ends off. A little heated out there all of a sudden
starts with a short ball on off stump, he comfortably sways out of the line
full on off stump, defended towards mid-off
big appeal for lbw! It's full and Raina misses his flick across the line but that pitched well outside leg
over the wicket, pushes his line wider outside off but Rayudu plays it well to find space square in the off side
confidently down the pitch and drives very correctly to long-off
sweeps from outside off, keeps it all along the ground to deep square
full on middle, Raina head over the ball as he defends
nicely bowled, a touch slower and draws him away from his body as he drives to the covers
good little contest, almost does Raina in the air as he advances down the pitch and he has to reach for the ball as he wasn't to the pitch
beaten, good delivery, outside off and it nipped away although Rayudu was also feeling outside his body
full and straight, dug out into the leg side
on middle and off, defended towards mid-off but Stokes skips across to field
a slower ball, 75mph, comes out as a full toss around leg stump and it's flicked to deep midwicket
on off stump, defended down by his feet
very full, outside off, jabbed out to deep cover off the toe of the bat
round the wicket, pushed across outside off, driven to cover
comes forward and flicks to midwicket
a powerful sweep to a full delivery, it's a skimming stroke towards deep square-leg but Finn is able to get around and then relays to Anderson
fired down the leg side
worked off his pads too deep midwicket
full and eased down the ground
outside leg stump, flicked wide of the leg slip towards fine leg
short of a length at off stump, defended to the on side
opens the face and places this through the off side
full outside off, takes the edge to third man but he was in control
short and pulled to long leg
banged in short outside off, 84mph, he chops it down to third man
short outside off, cut in the air out to deep point
he waits for this flatter delivery and chops it very very late past gully and this runs down to the boundary once it beats the fielder
even better and through the same region! This one is shorter and rises up a bit extra, but he just guides it through gully
make it three in a row.. Root keeps bowling flat and Raina keeps cutting them fine past the slip fielder.. Finn will chase it down this time
he comes forward and dabs the tossed up delivery to midwicket
comes forward belatedly and defends this one down the pitch
he is in no hurry. Comes forward behind the line and defends it solidly
there is a gully and there is a backward point and in between the two there is small gap.. Raina goes for it this time, plays really late and picks up a single to third man
he stays on the back foot and dabs the back of length delivery towards square leg
attempts a slower ball but loses direction. These is down the leg side and the keeper gets a bad bounce, allowing an extra run
short of length outside off, the batsman waits and runs it down to third man
short ball on the body, Raina pulls it to deep square leg. It's not the most convincing short - he plays it a bit like Ganguly this time - but was not in danger there.
he waits on the back foot and steers it to third man
short and wide, asking to be hit.. and Raina doesn't hold back. He flays it over backward point for his third boundary in that region
he does get this to tail in from wide of the crease and it flies past off stump as Rayudu leaves it alone
he comes down the pitch, giving himself some space too, and slaps it to deep cover for a single. He wanted a second but is sent back by Raina
bowls a fuller length outside off, Raina doesn't really come forward as he pushes this to point
back of length on the stumps, Raina is stuck behind the crease and tries to clip it to the leg side, but gets a leading edge back down the pitch
waits on the back foot and guides the length delivery down to third man for an easy one
tries to spear it on the pads but this one is down the leg side
he waits on the back foot and dabs it to backward point, but the fielder charges in to cut off the single
he waits in the crease and steers it down to third man although there isn't much room, plays it very close to the body
fuller length outside off, Rayudu doesn't mind blocking it down the pitch
short of length delivery outside off, rises up a bit on Rayudu, the batsman gets on top of it and defends it
stays on the back foot and shows the full face of the bat as he defends it down the pitch
cheeky cheeky! This is short of length and only a touch outside off, Rayudu waits, arches back and cuts it through slip for a boundary
tries to smash this one through point but gets an underedge through to the keeper
another one is helped to to third man for a single by Raina
looks to whack it on the up through off but gets a thick outside edge to third man
fuller outside off stump, Raina comes forward finally and punches it firmly to mid-off
and he takes the bowler on, comes forward and flicks it over wide mid-on with the angle of the delivery.. Just chips it, enough on it to clear the fielder
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman chops it down to gully
he shuffles across the stumps and works away the length delivery towards midwicket for a single
he stays in the crease and guides this one down to third man for a single
he nudges this one to midwicket and sends a charging Raina back
he shimmies down the pitch and gives himself room but the bowler chases him, cramps him for room. Rayudu defends it to off
does the same thing but the bowler keeps his line outside off, and pays for it, crashes it through extra cover for a boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, he nudges it to midwicket
this one is down the leg side but it wasn't far from either the stumps or the pads. Umpire Gough doesn't think it's a wide
length delivery angled across the batsman, Raina comes forward and pushes it solidly to cover
and what does Raina do? he scoops it over the infield with a beautiful inside out drive.. That goes high, but not long enough...just trickles to the boundary
fires it full on the pads but the batsman clips it down to fine leg wasily
attempts another yorker but Rayudu digs it out comfortably
he comes down the pitch but has to wait an extra second because it's a slower ball, steers it down to third man in the end
shortish delivery, Raina was shuffling to the off side already and this is at a comfortable height to pull too, he whacks it along the ground to the deep square leg boundary
he pushes this one too far down the leg side, Michael Gough calls it a wide this time
fuller delivery on off, he punches it straight down the ground to mid-on
he comes down the pitch and hammers it over the bowler's head this time.. Finn was down early to, ducking under this one
charges down the pitch again and cuts it through point for a couple of runs
Rayudu gets to his half-century with a calm upper cut over the slip cordon off a rising delivery. Superb effort for someone just coming in. He gets a big hug from the other guy in form, Raina
short of length delivery on the body, it's tucked away behind square for a single
fuller delivery on the stumps, Raina calmly pushes it to cover
pushes this one through, the batsman defends it comfortably
stays in the crease and pushes it to cover
no hurry at all, stays in the crease and defends this down the pitch
oh he has beaten Rayudu with his flight and turn but Buttler misses the stumping! Rayudu was out of the crease, but this one spins through the gap and the keeper is not able to gather
comes forward and defends this down the pitch
he comes down the pitch and plays an inside out drive to long off for a single
oh, that was close.. Raina chops it almost on to his off stump.. that was too close to cut. the keeper collects it to this left
short slower delivery, Raina gets inside the line and swats it down to fine leg for a single
short delivery outside off, there is not much pace at this moment and Rayudu defends it easily
cuts it down to third man as soon as he spots width
comes behind the line of it solidly and defends to mid-off
slower on the stumps, Raina dabs it down to third man for a single
round the wicket, forward and blocked
excellent catch! Raina comes down the pitch, lofts over midwicket and Woakes makes good ground from long-on to hold a tumbling catch. He was aiming squarer than it eventually went
full on off stump, defended
pushed into the off side
a little flatter outside off, left alone
tight stuff from Tredwell as Jadeja blocks this from middle and off...a wicket maiden
full at off stump, defended back to the bowler
just a fraction of width outside off and he drives it through square cover...no one in the deep
short of a length, he opens the face and steers down to third man
dismissive, lovely way to get off the mark with a flowing straight drive...a big stride forward and a textbook-perfect stroke
short, pulled through midwicket
decent delivery outside off, he just holds his bat inside the line as it goes through to Buttler
prods forward, the ball takes an inside edge to the leg side
worked down the ground
that sums up England's day, the ball was clipped into the leg side, it's an easy single, but Woakes' throw is a little off target and Buttler is blinded by Rayudu's running and can't gather the take
tossed up, he comes down the pitch and drives to long-on
tucked to the left of mid-on
that's the win! Swift footwork is a fitting way to do it, then he clips in the air over midwicket and they canter the brace that were needed
